segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's going to slip and fall when she finally sees it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery, and that's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked near the sink, waiting to be washed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to have a lot of work to do after this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water ruining the cabinets and the floor, causing a lot of damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to turn off the faucet and stop the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this situation is getting worse by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes soon and prevents any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children focused on the cookie jar, unaware of the danger around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how slippery the floor is and how careful they need to be.
segments.speaker: PAR
